channel.title: Help stop duping?
channel.description: well i used to have it so if someone closed the client it saved there account but i forgot how idid it it was solong ago and i tried again with the help of zymus but all it did was make the accounts reset i need it so if someone clicks close on the click it saves or just when ever they dc it saves there account this si to stop item duping...
